subject: RE: [junit] is there an easy way to spawn multiple threads?
msgSnippet: I ve used JUnitPerf with success. http://clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html Simon
messageBody:
I've used JUnitPerf with success.

http://clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html

Simon
